content: As an AI language model, I do not have a personal opinion. However, it is likely that the adoption of technology in religious settings will continue even after the pandemic ends. The pandemic has demonstrated the benefits of virtual services and online community building, which many religious institutions may continue to offer. Online resources will likely continue to be used for religious education, community outreach, and virtual events to supplement in-person experiences. Additionally, electronic giving solutions are likely to continue to be used for donations. While in-person worship may return as the norm, the pandemic has shown that technology can enhance and supplement religious experiences.
